alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cumberland and Cape May Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1032 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodbine, or 9 miles west of Ocean City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Ocean City, Cape May, Cumberland, Laurel Lake, Woodbine, Sea Isle City, Estell Manor, Avalon, West Cape May, Corbin City, Newport, Cape May Court House and Leesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Cumberland
